title: T206 George Mullen portrait drum / broadleaf
author: cobbcobb13

posts.post_title: T206 George Mullen portrait drum / broadleaf
posts.post_content:
I’m looking to find the drum and a broadleaf for the red Mullen / Mullin portrait. 
This is a lifelong project to finish this Detroiter backrun but it’s worth a shot to see if someone here has it/one. 

If you have one and would be willing to discuss a sale or trade, I’d love to chat
